title: Powertec Fitness Workbench Half Rack, Yellow - Exercise Equipment for Home Gym - Squat Rack and Weight Lifting Station - Professional Workout Equipment
features: Built for Strength and Durability: Powertec Fitness home gym equipment is designed for serious and intense workouts. With a maximum weight capacity of 1000 lbs, this pull up rack will bring your strength training to the next level.

Compact and Versatile: The unique design of this gym equipment for home makes it perfect for small spaces such as your garage. Our squat rack with pull up bar can be expanded with several attachments to perform infinite exercises and target different areas.

You can customize your rack to include the optional Dip Handles Workbench Utility Bench and Lat Tower Option which will allow you to expand your home gym with a variety of exercises (WB-HR18-LTO16-CN is needed to attach the optional Lat Tower (WB-LTO)

Sturdy and Reliable: Our fitness equipment features two vertical supports slightly curved inward to accommodate the higher chin-up bar and offers improved stability during training. The home workout equipment will withstand even the harshest sessions.

Safety Guaranteed: This strength training equipment is produced with professional and high quality materials to make your workout safe and smooth even when you're squatting with very heavy weights. This at home gym equipment is meant for a full body workout.
description: Designed following the same specification for our leading Power Rack the Workbench Half Rack is the perfect solution for serious trainers with limited space The new WB-HR will come with newly designed J-hooks and an increase in height Purchased separately the user has the option to expand in the future with our Lat Tower attachment (WB-LTO) (required connector WB-LTO-HR-CN ) or they can add the unique Workbench Utility bench (WB-UB) for a full range of additional exercises
